name: KitPupPOM! (DEMO)
description:
★Synopsis

The DOG-0 virus has invaded Europe! Will you be able to save mankind and the cats from dogs?

You're Michi, a domestic cat who woke up in an abandoned dog food facility. You've met some strange humans who are actually cats?! You don't know what's going on, but the only thing you know is that you'll have to stay with them to see your owner again (and survive?)

★Features
  • GUI,  art, story and script by Sinnia (I don't have friends.)
  • 13k words (Idk if that's too much or not for a demo lol!)
  • It's translated into English and Spanish (Insert bilingual joke here)
  • Multipe interactions (Choose whatever you want to say to the characters!)
  • Multiple endings depending on what decisions you make (Yeah, you can die!)
  • Point-and-click and battle system (Don't just read, interact!)
  • Custom cursor drawn by me (a cute little dog cookie, yay!)
  • Cats and dogs turned into humans everywhere (Because I don't know how to draw animals, artist facts!)
★Reviews

"This visual novel  drove up the sales of tennis balls"

- Willsoon.

"My dog enlisted in the navy after playing this amazing visual novel"

-  The New Pork Times.

"An incredible masterpiece, I hit the golden button for this demo 10/10"

-  Simon Cowbell.

(All these reviews are 100% real. Trust me, I'm a MySpace influencer)

★Special thanks

- Sedac (Amazing tutorials, bruh)

- Matalla, xavimat, Ertal, Chris Eman, Stawer, etc. (Thanks for being so patient with me to teaching me how to coding  <3)

- Rocloz (Ettecliff/Catie) (Sis, thanks for betatest and stuff, fufu)

- Andreis, Ferni, Rasaghale, Decadenttia, etc. (Thanks for English grammar tips!)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

! FRIENDLY REMINDER:

This visual novel is still in development. The demo contains the prologue and the first chapter. Constructive criticism is welcome!

If you liked my demo and you want to make a little contribution, feel free to buy me a ko-fi!
